name: Transcription Certification Institute
overview:
Transcription Certification Institute Inc. is a leading online institute providing certification courses to become certified transcriptionists with a very low fee.

TCI has developed a complete course with everything from grammar, spelling, punctuation, using templates, use of MS Word and more! Our course includes everything a transcription company requires from their certified transcriptionists. Additionally, we offer personal instruction, when necessary, to supplement our online program. We will do our best to help you earn your certificate and become eligible to contact transcription companies for employment.

Transcription Certification Institute Inc. is headquartered in Irvine, CA.

We are constantly expanding our services and providing training to aspirants to become certified transcriptionists!
